mapper.select: select count(*) from review where roomNum=#{num}
select ifnull(round(avg(rating),0),0) from review where roomNum=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into review (num, content, rating, reviewImageUrl, writeday, userNum, roomNum) values (null, #{content}, #{rating}, #{uploadFile}, now(), #{userNum}, #{roomNum})
mapper.update: update review set content =#{content}, rating=#{rating}, reviewImageUrl= #{uploadFile}, writeday=now() where num=1#{num}
